changelog.title: Supersets
copy: Customise supersets in a new editor.

changelog.title: Backups
copy: Create backups without granting LiftApp storage access.

changelog.title: Workouts
copy: See break time in a new floating bar.
Guided set progression; record results and move forward.
This update also inclues bug fixes and performance improvements.

changelog.title: What’s New
copy: Individually migrate values between Sets—past and ongoing.
Zip through Journal and the Exercise index with a new scroll bar.
Log Body Measurements in a reconstructed interface.
Check for app updates in Release Notes.

changelog.title: Fixes & Improvements
copy: Swifter loading of Exercises, Routines & the Training Plan.
Button labels in Training Plan and About aren’t trimmed.
Data like Release Notes is fetched from the Web.

changelog.title: Improvements & Fixes
copy: The Work Out button on the Routine page works as expected.
This update includes improvements and bug fixes.
